page.title: 13DEFENCE IN HAWKSHAW
page.content: Occupying a large area of upland grassland to the north of Hawkshaw is the{Holcombe Moor Training Camp.}This is owned by the{Ministry of Defence } and is used for the training of the armed forces. The camp has barracks, firing ranges and an{assault course.} This assault course has national fame in that it is used in the T.V. quiz- The Krypton Factor; were contestants have to complete the demanding course in record time. The Ministry of Defence has recently bought another 70 hectares of land adjacent to the camp. Local residents in Hawkshaw are pleased about this as it will mean that the land will not be used for property development and hence the semi-rural nature of the area will be maintained. The{landscape}of the area is ideal for the training of troops.
